accessToken.title: Tibber Access Token
accessToken.description: Your Tibber API key, click the link above to generate one if you don't have one already.

homeId.title: Tibber Home ID
homeId.description: Use only if you have multiple homes setup for your Tibber account. Otherwise, will use the first Home Tibber responds with

priceIncTax.title: Price including tax
priceIncTax.description: Show prices as total. (Gross, including any taxes)

activatePriceGraphing.title: Price graphing
activatePriceGraphing.description: If enabled, the plugin will generate a PNG image of the price throughout the day, stored under "/bla/test.png". Use together with https://github.com/Sunoo/homebridge-camera-ffmpeg

activatePriceSensor.title: Actual price sensor
activatePriceSensor.description: Register a "Light sensor" that will show the current electricity price (in the smallest currency format) as LUX level. (Can be used for automation)

activateRelativePriceSensor.title: Relative price sensor
activateRelativePriceSensor.description: Register a "HumiditySensor" that will show a value between 0 and 100%, based on the relative electricity price at any given moment. (Can be used for automation)
